|brand = AzureWave |model = AW-CE123 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = H |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/18/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/AzureWave_AW-CE123H |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = (half)
|vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 43b1 |subvendor_id = 1a3b |subdevice_id = 2123 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = QDS-BRCM1068 |icid = 4324A-BRCM1068 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 24:0A:64, 6C:71:D9
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4352; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = Yes |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0 |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/16/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00HRFS1GQ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/1119842 The PCI ID for this device is presumed to be] :14e4:43b1 (1a3b:2123)
This module seems to be used with <small>(at least)</small> the following devices... *'''ASUS''' ''G75VX'' series gaming laptops <small>('''Republic of Gamers''' / '''RoG''')</small> *'''ASUS''' ''G750'' series gaming laptops (G750JX-T4070H) <small>('''RoG''')</small> *'''ASUS''' [http://www.asus.com/Motherboards/RAMPAGE_V_EXTREME/ ''Rampage V Extreme''] motherboard <small>('''RoG''')</small> *'''GIGA-BYTE''' ''GA-Z87X-UD5 TH'' motherboard *'''HP''' ''ENVY Phoenix 810-160'' Desktop PC *'''ASROCK''' ''Z87E-ITX'' motherboard *'''ASROCK''' ''M8'' Barebones PC
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:AzureWave_AW-CE123H_1.jpg|front File:AzureWave_AW-CE123H_2.jpg|back </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
